title: Hill Chief (4R20)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Dunland
Twilight:	4
Card Type:	Minion • Man
Strength:	10
Vitality:	2
Site:	3
Game Text:	Shadow: Spot a site you control and exert Hill Chief to draw 3 cards.
Lore:	”'…Saruman has armed the wild hillmen and herdfolk of Dunland beyond the rivers, and these also he loosed upon us.'”
Rarity:	R
